benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/invoicePayments - Trigger a payment for all unpaid invoices

covered: POST Valid Payload scenarios (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC06, TC07) cover successful triggers and proper handling
POST Invalid Payload scenarios (TC08–TC16, TC20, TC21) cover malformed inputs, invalid IDs, missing/empty headers, and invalid values
Duplicate Submission handling (TC28) for retries without duplicating payments
Large Payload handling (TC23, TC24) covering extremely large paymentAmount and pluginProperty arrays
Input Validation coverage for inputs including accountId, paymentMethodId, paymentAmount, targetDate, externalPayment and pluginProperty
Server Error Handling coverage (TC18, TC19, TC27) including gateway and database failures and plugin system unavailability
Security testing (TC20, TC21) for SQL injection in accountId and XSS in pluginProperty
Edge cases and parameter handling (TC25 extra query params; TC26 state variation; TC29 backward compatibility)
Recovery from transient network errors (TC22) with retry semantics
Performance testing (TC30–TC32) for response times and resource usage
recommendations: Consider adding rate-limiting tests for POST to verify throttling behavior under bursts
Enhance idempotency/retry tests to ensure no duplicate payments across a wider set of scenarios
Add tests for HTTP 403 Forbidden in addition to 401 Unauthorized to cover authorization semantics
Add checks for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) if applicable to this endpoint
Test handling of additional/empty headers to ensure proper validation and error messages
